column2: "Task 8: <yellow>Attack an enemy with any weapon and place a marker on it"
"・Mark enemies by hitting them with attacks"
"・Mark enemies by hitting them with attacks"

"If you have learned the Class Skill \"Phantom Marker\", it will activate automatically.

When you attack an enemy, you will place a marker on it. Further attacks on marked enemies increase the level of the marker.

※The visual indicator of the marker disappears over time, but the effect remains. If you attack the enemy again, the marker visual will reappear."
